examples: Goniophlebium latifrons Witte in Del. Sem. Lugd.-Bat. 1863: 4. 1864
notes: As per the City Archive of Rotterdam, Henrich Witte was born 10th May 1829 (via Jan Hengstmengel; Leiden] The TL-2 shows the birth year as: 1825.
source: Biography in: Biografisch Woordenboek Gelderland (via Jan Hengstmengel; Leiden]
